website_summaries.verdict: Riptor the cyborg dinosaur and insane werewolf Sabrewulf are just two of Killer Instinct’s varied roster, and players will love learning how to bite, pummel, and ultra-combo opponents over Xbox Live.
pros: Cast of 29 wildly different warrior and monster fighters
Easy to learn, difficult to master
cons: It takes serious practice to win over Xbox Live against veteran players

customer_reviews.title: Saving Lots of Cash
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I was tired of paying $40 a season to get all the content released at the time. However, when this came out, I was overjoyed to learn that now players can get everything available right now in Killer Instinct without shelling out unneeded amounts of money!!! Collecting Season 1-3 of Killer Instinct on Xbox One, you automatically receive the game and all characters and customizable costumes for all characters that have them. You still need to unlock costume content in the game, but thats not too big of a gripe. The only downside is that I wish I knew of this sooner before I bought season 2....but everything else is okay in my book!
customer_reviews.author: SuperSonic22

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Killer Instinct game I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the wait! This is the best Killer Instinct game I've ever played! Be warned, though - installation will devour a massive 40Gb chunk of your precious HDD space!
customer_reviews.author: Randy J.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fighting game. Much more fast paced than Mortal Kombat games. The character select screen and menus are VERY slow on the Xbox One though. That's why it gets minus 1 star. Also, it includes ALMOST all of the characters but a couple still have to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Weeble Wobble

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Considering what you get with this edition of KI, the price is a bargain! It comes with around 30 characters, KI classic 1 and 2 and a bunch of the dlc the game has. In terms of fighting game for buck theres no better game out there!
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Received European version of the game... false listing on amazon, and they were fine with it... returned. Im sure the game is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Combos Galore.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first Xbox one game that I played and is above the hype. From character designs to the music and stages makes this the best recreation of a classic arcade hit. It also has a really easy learning curve that let's players of any age get into. I was surprised when I was playing against my friends 4 year old whom was pulling off counter breakers and shadow counters almost flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Happy to own it
customer_reviews.text: This is the reason to get a Xbox one for fighting fans this was my favorite and main reason to purchase the system. If you got a game pass they will allow you to have a free download but I only kept that for one month so that was it I got this today and very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: TamarBenz007

customer_reviews.title: Best Killer Instinct version Hands Down for XBOX One X
customer_reviews.text: Best version of Killer Instinct for XBox One X! Everything downloads flawlessly, even the extra content bonus code worked. Highly recommend for fighting game fans. Now I just need to get my SSD Drive and double my storage capacity.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: I’m late to the party but this game is really fun and packed with content. My head is still spinning. They made simplified command buttons for combos so this game isn’t hard for a casual or beginner to pick up and play. It’s definitely worth a shot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Don't get me wrong
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, been playing it since last year. I bought this version because it came with the soundtrack and shadowjago (which could only be bought budled with jago for $10) and a lot of other extras that I didn't have. The Gold Gargos code doesn't work for some reason. Also, please tell me why the "Official" soundtrack only has 12 songs on it? It's missing so many songs! I was hoping to get it all with this bundle, sadly I didn't. The Missing soundtracks are keeping this from getting 5 stars from me.

customer_reviews.title: fantastic fighting game
customer_reviews.text: fantastic fighting game, love the combos, music and gameplay. easy to learn the moves, but takes practice to get better, like most fighting games. I play it with a MK arcade fight stick and it's even more fun that way. if you're not playing it with an arcade stick, it's totally worth it to buy yourself one. side note, to use 360 arcade sticks on xbox one, you need an adapter, the gtuner titanone works great for that purpose. let me know if you need help setting it up.

In order to access all the characters you need the CD or it will not give you access to all of the characters. Save your money and wait for the complete version.

customer_reviews.title: Old school and new school
customer_reviews.text: Great fighting game but this game will get boring real fast if you're playing by yourself. Perfect balance of being colorful and dark. A little story mode. Shopville.ca shipped this real fast, along with a coupon for my first purchase. And it comes with Killer Instinct Classic 1&2. Along with Rare Replay (Killer Instinct Gold) I might have all of the Killer Instinct games. Play old school and the reboot of Killer Instinct games. Great purchase and fast shipping.

product_meta.title: Killer Instinct: Definitive Edition - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:DefinitiveFIGHT ON! Discover your Killer Instinct! Play the legendary fighting game with stunning 60FPS visuals, over-the-top action, a wild cast of combatants, rocking reactive music, and C-C-C-COMBO BREAKERS! Includes all 26 characters and 20 stages from Seasons 1-3, as well as Killer Instinct Classic 1&2. Explore the lore, characters and music of Killer Instinct with exclusive behind-the-scenes videos, artwork and an original game soundtrack.
feature_bullets: Killer Instinct: Definitive Edition includes all 26 characters and 20 stages from Seasons 1-3, Killer Instinct Classic 1&2, Killer Instinct Original Soundtrack, and a bonus skin pack, Gold Gargos
Explore the lore, characters and music of Killer Instinct with exclusive behind-the-scenes videos, artwork and an original game soundtrack
Compete in online multiplayer matches or test your skill online in Monthly Ranked Leagues
Play a cinematic story mode or train an AI combatant and challenge your friends to matches in Shadow Labs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
